name: Snow Lantern
description:
This project was made for a one-week long artjam, where we began by choosing an artwork at the Gallery of Modern Art. We then got to try to make a game with the same meaning as the artwork we chose. 

Snow Lantern is based on the work "Ashes" by Ly Hoàng Ly.
